Key Match Events: Virat Kohli dropped a catch in India's loss to South Africa in Perth.
Rohit Sharma missed a run-out opportunity as India lost by 5 wickets.
Suryakumar Yadav played a blinder of a knock, scoring 68 off 40 balls.
Arshdeep Singh picked up the big wickets of Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw in his first over.
Mohammed Shami dismissed South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma.
David Miller and Aiden Markram stitched a 74-run partnership that turned out to be match-winning.
Aiden Markram hit a match-winning 52 while David Miller remained unbeaten on 56.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma conceded that India were not up to the mark on the field and missed several chances.
Rohit Sharma defended his decision to give R Ashwin the 18th over, explaining he wanted to try something different.
